alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Baca and east central Las Animas Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Pritchett, or 23 miles southwest of Springfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pritchett around 440 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
